description: This file defines an immutable class 'Tile' representing a game tile for a 2048 game implementation in Flutter. The class includes properties like id, value, row, column, and isNew, and provides methods for copying with modifications, string representation, equality checks, and hash code calculation.

classes.name: Tile
classes.description: Represents an immutable game tile in a 2048 game grid with tracking and animation support.

methods.name: Tile
methods.description: Constructor for creating a new Tile instance with specified properties.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of this Tile with optional overrides for its properties.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the Tile for debugging.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Checks for equality with another object, considering all properties.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Provides a hash code based on all properties for use in collections.
